attributes.action: Stop the extension of the process of crime act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is against the powers given to agencies other than the police to search homes, seize property, freeze bank accounts and seize cash that are being bestowed upon them in November of 2009.

rejection.details: The act you are referring to is called the Proceeds of Crime Act and there is an existing petition addressing this subject which you may wish to sign: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/ProceedsofCrime/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
